name: Stewie Bike HD PC Port
description:
Sad that flash despawed so I made a PC port of the only game that mattered and that was Stewie bike and it is also in 4 BY 3 ISN'T THAT COOL IT WAS TOTALLY BECAUSE I HAD NO CLUE HOW TO MAKE THIS GAME 16 BY 9 but it is in HD

also the enter button now works because in the original the enter button would not let you face forward so now it works

shoutout to notaspeedrunner
